Params: {2: 'HNB1', 3: 'When I went to look for food, I went into a food processing plant.'}
{2: 'HNB1', 3: "There's something off about the factory. It's empty, but it's still operating."}
{2: 'HNB1', 3: 'I climbed over a noise barrier and entered the factory. The noise from the machines was deafening.'}
{2: 'HNB1', 3: "Countless Tai'E and Guardians were hanging on the production line and moving along a huge machine."}
{2: 'HNB1', 3: 'They were pulverized and flattened into scrap metal on the work bed.'}
{2: 'HBG3', 3: "The duty of Tai'E is to protect humanity."}
{2: 'HBG3', 3: "Robots obey orders. The highest command of Tai'E is to protect mankind. All Tai'E are the sameâ€”simple and easy to understand."}
{2: 'HBG3', 3: "But you have always been different. I never know what you're going to do."}
{2: 'HBG3', 3: "I never hated you. I'm not installed with an emotion module, so I can't like or hate."}
{2: 'HBG3', 3: 'I just feel... unaccustomed around you, and confused.'}
{2: 'HNB1', 3: 'G3... Sorry. For a moment, I wavered and had doubts about the point of my existence in the world.'}
{2: 'HNB1', 3: 'I feel that there is malice and confrontation in this world.'}
{2: 'HNB1', 3: 'But I have also felt that... humans... are full of goodwill and are worthy of protection.'}
{3: "So this time, I'm not executing orders because of my programming."}
{3: "But because I want to. That's why I chose this human. Because this human being is special to me..."}
